short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Custodial wallet to rent assets without limit on LootRush

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,es,es_419,et,: Discover the LootRush Custodial Wallet: your gateway to renting premium NFTs. Developed by the innovative LootRush Team, this secure and user-friendly wallet offers a seamless experience for NFT renters. Browse our curated selection of high-quality NFTs for short-term use. With smart contracts ensuring secure transactions and a user-friendly interface, the LootRush Custodial Wallet opens up a world of possibilities. Immerse yourself in the future of NFT rentals today and elevate your digital experience.
long.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US:
LootRush Wallet: your gateway to renting premium gaming NFTs. 

This secure and user-friendly wallet offers a seamless experience for NFT renters. By using LootRush wallet, you will be able to rent NFTs and play games worth up to U$10,000. 

You won't need to deposit any collateral, do KYC, save or credit card or anything. 

Steps to use this wallet: 
1) sign up and sign in at lootrush.com
2) install the chrome extension
3) sync the extension / sign in with your lootrush.com account
4) copy your LootRush wallet address
5) rent NFTs through lootrush.com
6) send them to your LootRush wallet
7) play your favorite game

This wallet will allow you to hold NFTs and play games with the rented NFTs, and protect LootRush and its NFT owners by blocking any unwanted transactions like NFT sales, transfers, and others. This wallet is compatible with most games on EVM-compatible chains like Zed Run, Gods Unchained, Voxies, Cross the Ages, Sunflower Land, and many others.
